p: The inhibitory enzymatic activity of compound 35, the one most active against the WNV NS2-NB3 protease, was evaluated at eight different concentrations (66 μmol L -1–0.5 μmol L -1) using the protease assay as described above. Fluorescence was measured in triplicate wells at intervals of 30 s for 5 min in three independent experiments. IC 50 values were calculated using GraphPad Prism software 6 (GraphPad Software Inc., San Diego, CA, United States), using four-parameter nonlinear regression analysis (Hill slope method).
